"Just like him, she says what she wants because she can- there is nobody there to tell either of them to stop. Ben Roethlisberger isn't as speedy as Aaron Rodgers and Michael Vick or as statuesque as Tom Brady and Peyton Manning ; he just makes it work. "I'm always trying to get better," he said. I'm trying to make better decisions, smarter decisions. I try not to put us in a bad situation. PROPOSED HIKES Business at Plattsburgh International Airport has boomed since it opened in 2007, as thousands of Canadians have taken advantage of direct flights to Florida, South Carolina and the Caribbean.
